sentences.english: Cameroon Ministry of Communications has also ordered three companies of informal long-distance passenger business for rectification.
sentences.chinese: 喀交通部還勒令三家非正規長途客運公司停業整頓。

sentences.english: Do you want the West Highway Station or the North?
sentences.chinese: 您要去臺汽客運西站還是北站呢？

sentences.english: Railway passenger station always put the passenger flow line as the focus of design ideas.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路客運站歷來把旅客流線作爲其設計構思的重點。

sentences.english: The last passenger train was ready to depart at Chia-Yi Station.
sentences.chinese: 最後一班客運車即將自嘉義車站發車。

sentences.english: Improves existing passenger rail lines serving the state's major population centers.
sentences.chinese: 改善現有的鐵路客運線路和該州的主要人口中心。

sentences.english: They usually only fly intra-continental and have a single passenger class.
sentences.chinese: 它們通常只是在內陸飛行，並且只擁有一種客運級別。

sentences.english: Airports say overall passenger numbers dropped 5 percent in Europe last year.
sentences.chinese: 而歐洲的機場則表示去年的客運量下降了5%。

sentences.english: Today, the railway passenger transport offer people hard seat and soft seat.
sentences.chinese: 今天鐵路客運有硬座和軟座之分。

sentences.english: Airline passenger volume has dropped by 20 percent.
sentences.chinese: 航空客運量已經下降了20%。

sentences.english: The local train does not connect with the Amtrak train.
sentences.chinese: 當地的列車不和美國鐵路客運公司的列車相連。

sentences.english: The paper studies the feasibility of developing high speed passenger transport in Fuzhou Xiamen shipping line.
sentences.chinese: 對福廈航線開展水上高速客運的可行性作了分析。

sentences.english: Traffic between the two countries grew 12 percent last year.
sentences.chinese: 兩國間的客運量去年增長了12%。

sentences.english: Finally, our results are used to estimate the number of passengers in highroad transportation.
sentences.chinese: 最後將模型應用於公路客運人數的估計。

sentences.english: First of all, the article simply expounds some basic conception of Chengdu station.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先簡單介紹了成都站的基本概況和客運設備。

sentences.english: The glazed Terminal Building is placed in the center below the roof structure.
sentences.chinese: 光滑的客運樓在屋頂結構的中心的下方。

sentences.english: Settle of hotel of east of first case forest at Beijing on the west the square austral passenger station.
sentences.chinese: 首家格林東方酒店落戶於北京西客運站南廣場。

definition: to pass through a country's territory/transit
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
